sys_update_set.description: Project Name: Data Load & Transformation Framework One-line Summary: Built data transformation framework for seamless HR-to-ServiceNow integration. Project Specification: • Modules: Import Sets, Transform Maps, Scheduled Jobs • Tasks: o Create a data source (CSV/XML) with 50 sample employee records (name, dept, email). o Build Import Set table and Transform Map to map data → sys_user. o Write Transform Scripts to normalize email IDs (lowercase, strip spaces). o Schedule nightly job to import file and log results. o Add Business Rule to prevent duplicate user records. • Deliverable: Automated HR data import with integrity checks. • GitHub URL: https://github.com/anurampalli/Data-Load-Transformation-Framework.git
sys_update_set.name: US Data Load & Transformation Framework
